column4: Hello!  I tried mounting a new HDD by following the instructions at http://daryl.learnhouston.com/2006/05/03/adding-a-hard-drive-to-a-ubuntu-linux-box/ but it didn't come back on reboot.  Can anyone help me figure this out?
what did you format it as?  Does it have any data on it?
I try mounting my disk manually, but it says the drive (/dev/sdb1) doesn't exist, yet /dev/sdb1 does show up when i use fdisk -l  (I'm also browsing TuxFiles, thanks for the resource)
can you paste the complete command you are using and the error output on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org ?
what does your fstab look like?
it says no such file or directory when I try ls /dev/sdb1
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=132094 is someone with a similar issue
i'm running fiesty not breezy, but I'll keep reading. Thx btw
